event.title: Machine learning Certification Training Demo
event.description:
Being a premier e-learning institute, Intellipaat provides a comprehensive Machine Learning with Python training in and around Hyderabad, India. This course helps you gain expertise in various aspects of Machine Learning. Learning outcomes include Machine Learning with Python programming, supervised and unsupervised learning, Support Vector Machines, Random Forest Classifiers, best practices of Machine Learning, and more, which you will acquire through hands-on projects and case studies.

What will you learn in this best Machine Learning course in Hyderabad?

*How to use data to train machines
*Data modeling in Principle Component Analysis
*Concepts of linear regression with multiple variables using Python
*Representing an artificial neural network
*Classification of logistic regression using Python
*Concepts of Vector Machine algorithms
*Designing Machine Learning system

Who should take up this Machine Learning Course with Python?

*Professionals in Analytics, Data Science, E-commerce, and Search Engine domains
*Professionals who are looking for switching their careers and freshers

Take up this course to be professional in Machine Learning.

Key Resources:

Machine Learning Algorithm

Machine learning interview questions

Types of machine learning

Machine learning datasets
